categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: Thaldo was a planet located within the Thaldo system of the Mid Rim.

An icy world with a Rebel outpost during the Galactic Civil War, it was the site of the Battle of Thaldo. During the Empire's first wave of assault, the planet's ion cannon was damaged, but repaired by Luke Skywalker so the Rebels could evacuate.
The Rebel cell on Thaldo was one of many infiltrated by Nagai spies some time following the Battle of Yavin.
